abstract: Warren E. Buffett and his sizable insurance team are betting that at least one Spanish firm is in good financial shape, even as its home country remains on shakier economic ground.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett and his sizable insurance team are betting that at least one Spanish firm is in good financial shape, even as its home country remains on shakier economic ground.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett has generally shied away from dipping his toe into southern Europe. But Mr. Buffett is nothing if not full of surprises.

headline.main: Berkshire Moves Into Spain With CaixaBank Reinsurance Deal
headline.print_headline: Berkshire Acquires Spanish Insurer’s Cash Flow

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
